meta.content: Jeopardy Archive McKinnie Lee Sizemore Andrew Pau Margaret Miles Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7280.

td.p: McKinnie Lee Sizemore, a DJ and music journalist from Orlando, Florida
Andrew Pau, an assistant professor from Amherst, Ohio
Margaret Miles, a librarian from Wilmington, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $40,100)

tr.td: SPEAKER'S CORNER
COUNTRY MUSIC
IN MY DESK DRAWER
WRITERS BY INITIALS
(Alex: We'll give you the initials, you give us the full name of the author.)
"KNOCK", KNOCK
WHO'S THERE?
